channel.title: Barter System
channel.description:
This is something I attempted to do back in 2011-2012 when I ran FJ.
I am interested in getting feedback on how a barter system can:
-Be implemented/started -Continued for several months -How to keep the value of items the same over periods of time without discontinuing (if possible)

item.title: Barter System
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Well in this project it’s a mix sort of like a Harry Potter/Runescape mix if that makes sense.

You start off as a 1st year and you can ear certain robes/armor etc at whatever year you are at. I haven’t written the full story line/system yet however there may be “advanced students” who are able to wear robes on a higher level for like partial time.(if that makes sense…)

I haven’t decided if I am wanting to make it just drops or to release like a school point type of shop that is opened during certain times like during a “school time” type of schedule.

I would love to get all the feedback I can though on this.

Read full topic

item.title: Barter System
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

more depth in the concept. npcs trading items for items, or players?

if it’s npcs trading players for item swaps, then create a method to define the upper bounds and lower bounds of the cost of the item(s) and base it between the middle or w/e, then find an item of a similar price. this can be done externally or hardcoded (suggest not).
however, although this idea is nice, i don’t think it would work very well if your basing it throughout your server; as players might demand a certain item more then another (or need it more), if this is the case then people would be trying to get a specific item to obtain within that region. furthermore, you’ll going to have to implement a lot of npc drops, just sayin’

Read full topic
